title: WP6 - Longitudinal Profile
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
findingsText: Part of this research has been extended towards the development of novel techniques to mitigate electron cloud development in large accelerator facilities. This has been achieved by nanosecond laser processing of metal surfaces to produce a micro-structured surface that suppresses secondary electron emission. Electron cloud mitigation (minimisation) techniques will be of general use in space &amp; aerospace applications, plus in general vacuum electronic development. Aerospace, Defence and Marine,Creative Economy,Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Electronics,Manufacturing, including Industrial Biotechology,Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections,Security and Diplomacy
